sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de gōngzuò yālì hěn dà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a beaucoup de pression au travail.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has a lot of work pressure.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī wèi zhùmíng de yǎnyuán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle est une actrice célèbre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She is a famous actress.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān yángguāng hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le soleil est magnifique aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The sunshine is great today.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qiánmiàn yǒu gè wān, xiǎoxīn kāichē.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a un virage devant, conduis prudemment.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is a curve ahead, drive carefully.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yīqiè dōu huì hǎo qǐlái de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tout ira bien.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Everything will be fine.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā hěn nǔlì, yīncǐ chénggōng le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a travaillé dur, c'est pourquoi il a réussi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He worked hard, therefore he succeeded.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 每个人都有自己的优点。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Měi gè rén dōu yǒu zìjǐ de yōudiǎn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Chacun a ses propres qualités.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Everyone has their own strengths.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng qù, kěshì méiyǒu shíjiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je voudrais y aller, mais je n'ai pas le temps.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to go, but I don't have time.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他给我留下了很深的印象。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā gěi wǒ liúxià le hěn shēn de yìnxiàng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il m'a laissé une profonde impression.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He left a deep impression on me.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng yùxí míngtiān de kèwén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez préparer la leçon de demain.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please preview tomorrow's lesson.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shì wǒ de zérèn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est ma responsabilité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is my responsibility.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ dìng le yī běn shíshàng zázhì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je me suis abonné à un magazine de mode.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I subscribed to a fashion magazine.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīngjì zēngzhǎng le bǎifēnzhī wǔ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'économie a augmenté de cinq pour cent.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The economy grew by five percent.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xūyào zhěnglǐ yīxià fángjiān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je dois ranger ma chambre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I need to tidy up my room.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de fángjiān hěn zhěngqí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Sa chambre est très bien rangée.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His room is very tidy.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège jiàgé tài guì le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce prix est trop cher.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This price is too expensive.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de gùshi ràng wǒ hěn gǎndòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Son histoire m'a beaucoup touché.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His story moved me very much.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 飞机将在十分钟后起飞。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Fēijī jiāng zài shí fēnzhōng hòu qǐfēi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'avion décollera dans dix minutes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The plane will take off in ten minutes.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Xièxie nǐ yīzhí zhīchí wǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Merci de m'avoir toujours soutenu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Thank you for always supporting me.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen shāngliang yīxià zěnme bàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Discutons de ce qu'il faut faire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's discuss what to do.
